overview: Umid, a native of Uzbekistan, came to Russia to work to help his family. At night, the taxi driver decides to take the last call and goes to the sleeping area for the client. At the address of the call, Umid notices skinheads – "did they call a taxi?". Unfortunately, the trap for an immigrant will turn out to be more sophisticated and cruel, because the literature teacher of the local school has conceived an insidious crime, for which she is not going to be punished: she is obsessed with the idea of clearing the world of frivolous girls who do not stay at home at night. Who will be suspected of murdering a young blonde: an exemplary literature teacher or a young immigrant from Uzbekistan?
title: In Place
